page.title: 07SHOPS IN S.CROYDON
page.content: There are a wide variety of shops in our area.We have got a lot of newsagents and antique shops.We have got quite a few pubs,such as the Red Deer,the Purley Arms,the Windsor castle and the Royal Oak.We have got a lot of garages and a lot of non_food shops.There are six D.I.Y. shops and four restaurants.We also have eleven food shops. There are lots of shops on the Brighton Road, which is the main road through Croydon,because this is where most of the traffic is and so they get more customers than if they were in a side street.There are also some snack bars and take_away food shops,particularly for the lunchtime trade.
